details.title: Special offer just for you!
details.text:
With Vodafone Backup+ you can get 25GB Dropbox space for only €1.99 per month

  • 25GB additional space
  • €1.99 per month
  • Cancel any time!

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: Please accept the terms and conditions
checkbox.confirmationMessage: By accepting to subscribe now you will activate your Dropbox offer of 25GB for €1.99 per month. You will see this charge on your Vodafone bill. You can cancel at any time.

accordion.label: Offer details
accordion.text:
Additional space

The space given is on top of any current Dropbox space you may already have.

Internet charges

You'll pay our standard data charges to use this service when you're roaming or when you've exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

You can unsubscribe from the offer any time via the My Offer page in your Backup+ app.

success.title: Congratulations!
success.text: You now have 25GB of Dropbox space for only €1.99 per month. You can cancel at any point from the ‘My Offer’ tab within your Backup+ app.

details2.title: Unsubscribe from your offer
details2.text:
By ending your offer you will lose your bonus 25GB of Dropbox space.

You will still be able to use Backup+ for syncing your contacts and backing up to Dropbox as long as you have enough Dropbox space.

Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?
